page.title: 19 The Ravenhall's Typical Day
page.content: The family wake up from 6.45 to 7.30 and Mr.Ravenhall leaves to go to work in Birmingham.He is the Director of the West Midlands Computer Company. Gina feeds the rabbits and the chickens and then cleans out the cat tray.Then after breakfast the rest of the family leave the house at 8.30. Mrs. Ravenhall works at Stratford High School as a secretary.Carl and Gina go to Alcester Grammar School by bus. Mrs.Ravenhall arrives home at 1.30,then Gina and Carl arrive home at 4.30 and then they each do different activities of the sporting nature,for example Gina plays tennis and hockey. Then the whole family have tea together and go to bed around 10 to 11 o'clock.
